sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; const ProgressContent = () => { // Sample progress data const courses = [ { id: 1, name: 'Computer Vision', grade: 'A', attendance: 95, engagement: 88, assignments: { completed: 8, total: 10 } }, { id: 2, name: 'Machine Learning', grade: 'A-', attendance: 90, engagement: 85, assignments: { completed: 7, total: 8 } }, { id: 3, name: 'Deep Learning', grade: 'B+', attendance: 85, engagement: 78, assignments: { completed: 5, total: 7 } }, { id: 4, name: 'Data Visualization', grade: 'A', attendance: 92, engagement: 90, assignments: { completed: 6, total: 6 } }, ]; // Calculate overall stats const overallStats = { averageGrade: 'A-', averageAttendance: courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.attendance, 0) / courses.length, averageEngagement: courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.engagement, 0) / courses.length, assignmentsCompleted: courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.assignments.completed, 0), totalAssignments: courses.reduce((sum, course) => sum + course.assignments.total, 0), }; return (

Academic Progress

Track your performance across all courses.

{/* Overall progress cards */}

Average Grade

{overallStats.averageGrade}

Attendance

{overallStats.averageAttendance.toFixed(1)}%

Engagement

{overallStats.averageEngagement.toFixed(1)}%

Assignments

{overallStats.assignmentsCompleted}/{overallStats.totalAssignments}

{/* Course-specific progress */}

Course Progress

{courses.map(course => (

{course.name}

{course.grade}
{/* Attendance progress bar */}
Attendance {course.attendance}%
{/* Engagement progress bar */}
Engagement {course.engagement}%
{/* Assignments progress bar */}
Assignments {course.assignments.completed}/{course.assignments.total}
))}
{/* Engagement metrics - highlighting the CoreMentis engagement analysis */}

Engagement Metrics

Your engagement is tracked using Intel's OpenVINO models through CoreMentis:

Attention Level

85%

Based on gaze tracking and facial analysis

Participation

72%

Based on interaction frequency

Emotional Response

Positive

Based on facial expression analysis

); }; export default ProgressContent;
